member.name: ID3D11DepthStencilState.GetDesc
member.summary: Gets the description for depth-stencil state that you used to create the depth-stencil-state object.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives a description of the depth-stencil state.

member.name: ID3D11DepthStencilState
member.summary: The depth-stencil-state interface holds a description for depth-stencil state that you can bind to the output-merger stage.
